title: Heir of Doom
description: Roxanne Fosch has joined the Hunters. She no longer has to run and hide, but other problems have surfaced. Her clan has other plans for her, and even the combined might of the hunters might not be able to save her.To survive, Roxanne will have to choose between being labeled a traitor and cast out as a rogue - or join hands with the darker powers to save her life, and the lives of her friends.To achieve her goals, sheâ€™ll have to risk her life. But can she control the powers she's still learning to use, and fears so much?
author: Jina S. Bazzar
